name.may: "at the mouth of the well of the Itza"

xml.description:
Chitzen Itza is a UNESCO world Heritage Site. Much of the history of Chichen Itza is unknown. The cite is widely accpeted to be used as a ceremonial centerfor the Maya Civilization, from 550 to 800AD. The area was then abondended for around 100 years, being resettled around 900AD. IN 1250 the city was again abandonded.
Chitzen Itza is a UNESCO world Heritage Site.

location.modloc: Loacted on the Yucatan Pennsuila in soutern part of Mexico.

gen.gods: whatever a specific god is ex=Earthquake
gen.rel: Whatever a specifc Relic may be ex=Sun Calendar
gen.temp: A specifc temple or area = Chichén Itzá
